title: Does the NBA Have a TV Ratings Problem? | Group Chat
description:
We take a look at the Rockets protesting their loss to the Spurs (2:00) and discuss the NBA’s plummeting ratings (14:00). Then Jonathan Tjarks joins the show to compare team power ranking tiers (29:30).
 
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Justin Verrier
Guest: Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
